name: Discover Depth of Beach
short_des: The average depth of the ocean is 3,700 meters (12,100 feet). But the deepest part ever recorded is located in the western part of the Pacific Ocean, in the Mariana Trench, at a depth of around 11,000 meters (36,200 feet).

name: Regent Prohibits Travelers Who Have Been to China Boarding
short_des: Travelers who have visited mainland China within 30 days of their voyage with Regent Seven Seas Cruises will not be allowed to board.

name: Artsy New York
short_des: Browse over 1 million artworks, 4,000 galleries & top auction houses in over 100 countries. The world’s top galleries, auction houses, and museums — all in one place. Place inquiries. Purchase instantly. Discover art. Follow artists.
